# The final release of the SwehVd corpus - what's new
This document lists the additions and changes made to the SwehVd corpus for the final release, July 2024.

  * Added textgrids and sound files for 4 male talkers recorded in 2024, completing the database (N=48 talkers, N=24 female).
  * Added demographic information about the final four male talkers + information on mispronunciations (Persson-2023-correction.rmd).
  * Added files with data points to manually repair (..._to_repair.csv) and manually corrected data (..._repaired.csv), for these four talkers.
  * Updated README files.
